modName: Frankie King - The Breton Male High-mage
summary: A versatile male mage, thought it was time to add a male follower with all the female infesting followers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b][font=Comic Sans MS][font=Lobster][img]http://i.imgur.com/S0J2s5E.jpg[/img]
Frankie's Backstory[/font][/font]
[/b][/size]
A Breton growing up in Highrock from a rather poor farming family. One night a group of Bandits raided the farm, killed his mother and father, took his sister as a trophy and made him watch as they violated her and tossed her from Bandit to Bandit. He was taken prisoner, being too young to kill, one night he took his sister and fled to Skyrim. As of now, her whrereabouts are unknown. After a while he found the College of Winterhold and gained entrance and learned under Archemage Savos Aren. He had the highest aptitude for the destruction magic and eventually mastered the Expert-level spells. Today, he resides in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.


[size=6][font=Lobster]Version and Planned features[/font]
[size=3]-1.102 (See Changelog for Changes)
-Personal Questline
-Unique, custom diagloue
-Marriageable
-Female follower (For you Pervs out there)

[size=6][font=Lobster]Recruiting Voice actors[/font]
[size=3]I'm recruiting 2 or 3 voice actors, one female and two male. Message me for more info.
Female role - Frankie's Sister
Two male roles - Bandit leader who kidnapped Frankie and his sister. And the dragon the leader captured.

[size=6]Known Spells
[size=3]-Ebonyflesh
-Incinerate
-Icespike
-Summon Storm and Frost Atronach (Though rarely uses them)
-Lightning Bolt
-Steadfast Ward[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/center]
author: DoubleExFatez
